meanings.definition: Making a lot of noise; loud
meanings.sent1: The playground was the noisiest place in the entire school.
meanings.sent2: The noisiest student in the class always sat at the back.
meanings.sent3: The noisiest bird in the forest was the chatty parrot.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter was the noisiest melody in the room.
meanings.sent5: The thunderstorm outside grew even noisier as the night went on.

meanings.definition: Characterized by or producing a lot of noise
meanings.sent1: The construction site was the noisiest area in the neighborhood.
meanings.sent2: The noisiest car on the street woke up the entire block.
meanings.sent3: The noisiest alarm clock in the world couldn't wake him up.
meanings.sent4: The noisiest argument between the siblings echoed through the house.
meanings.sent5: The noisiest fireworks display lit up the night sky with a bang.

meanings.sent1: In the contest of who could be the noisiest, the toddler won.
meanings.sent2: The noisiest at the party was the DJ with the booming music.
meanings.sent3: The noisiest of all the animals in the zoo was the roaring lion.
meanings.sent4: The noisiest in the orchestra was the enthusiastic percussionist.
meanings.sent5: The noisiest in the classroom was the enthusiastic student sharing stories.
